logLevel.adjusted: Log level adjusted to: {level} due to debug mode change

debugMode.name: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable verbose logging for debugging purposes. Non-error messages will only appear when this is enabled.

logLevel.name: Log Level
logLevel.hint: Controls how detailed the logs are. When debug mode is on, only TRACE and DEBUG levels are available. When debug mode is off, only INFO, WARN, ERROR and NONE levels are available.

debugLogLevel.name: Debug Log Level
debugLogLevel.hint: Controls how detailed the logs are when debug mode is ON. Only used when debug mode is enabled.

normalLogLevel.name: Normal Log Level
normalLogLevel.hint: Controls how detailed the logs are when debug mode is OFF. Only used when debug mode is disabled.

hpHighColour.name: HP Full Colour
hpHighColour.hint: The colour shown when a token is at full health

hpLowColour.name: HP Low Colour
hpLowColour.hint: The colour shown when a token is at low health

tempHpColour.name: Temporary HP Colour
tempHpColour.hint: The colour shown for temporary hit points

backgroundColour.name: Background Arc Colour
backgroundColour.hint: The colour of the background arc

maxPerception.name: Maximum Perception Value
maxPerception.hint: The highest perception score that will be considered for uncertainty calculations (Default: 30)

minPerception.name: Minimum Perception Value
minPerception.hint: The lowest perception score that will be considered for uncertainty calculations (Default: 1)

basePerception.name: Base Perception Value
basePerception.hint: The baseline perception score from which uncertainty is calculated (Default: 10)

maxUncertainty.name: Maximum Uncertainty
maxUncertainty.hint: The maximum amount that HP display can vary (Default: 30%)

perceptionScaling.name: Perception Scaling Factor
perceptionScaling.hint: How much each point of perception reduces uncertainty (Default: 2%, higher values = perception matters more)

activeAlpha.name: Active Alpha
activeAlpha.hint: The opacity of the health arc when a token is active or selected (Default: 1.0)

inactiveAlpha.name: Inactive Alpha
inactiveAlpha.hint: The opacity of the health arc when a token is inactive/not selected (Default: 0.25)
